snippet.title: Farland Story 3 (PC 98) Part 1 I Can Be Killed By Anything Now
snippet.description:
Ah yes the third installment of the series (english translated),with the difficulty amped up significantly

The first battle has 3 allies, and a slew of green slimes aiming RIGHT at you.Its to point out that you can be killed easily (VERY) easy in this version,go being tactical is a must for survival

One big difference is the terrain in this game plays a vital role in defense and heal %(now its much more harder to win battles against enemies who pre-occupy towns)

You have Arc(if he dies its GG) who will be your damage/defense dealer for a LONG while, a cleric, and a close range mage who will die...easily.There is still those hidden chests around, but shopping is far and between...

Support me on Pateron.A little can go a long way for me https://www.patreon.com/were1974
